site.title: Sewon Printing - Professional Printing, Copying & Binding Services
site.description: We create even a single book with your precious heart. Sewon Printing is a professional printing, copying, and binding company.
site.keywords: Sewon Printing, printing services, copying, binding, Yeongdeungpo

hero.title: We create even a single book with your precious heart.
hero.subtitle: Sewon Printing is a professional printing, copying, and binding company located in Yeongdeungpo. We meet all your requirements with the highest quality and fast service.

pod.title: POD Service
pod.description: We provide Print on Demand customized small-volume publishing (printing) services. Using digital printing, we create small-volume products reflecting various requirements.

copying.title: Copying Service
copying.description: We provide fast and accurate color and black & white copying services. We handle all copying including high-speed copying and large-volume copying quickly.

binding.title: Binding Service
binding.description: We provide various binding services including spiral binding (coiling/twin ring), perfect binding, saddle stitching. We finish proposals, reports, booklets, etc. neatly.

scanning.title: Scanning Service
scanning.description: We provide high-resolution scanning services. We convert paper documents to digital files and provide them via email or USB. OCR services are also available.

booklets.title: Booklet Production
booklets.description: We create various orders including proposals, reports, manuals, presentation materials, meeting materials, even personal collection booklets.

printing.title: Various Printed Materials
printing.description: We provide high-quality printed outputs including flyers, small publications, guides, etc. according to consumer requirements.

ai_image.title: ğŸ¤– AI Image Creation
ai_image.description: Create custom images with cutting-edge AI technology. We produce various designs including logos, posters, and illustrations quickly and at reasonable prices.

location.title: Location
location.description:
Located near the inner area of Yeongdeungpo Fire Station, across from Yeongdeungpo Times Square.
Brief parking available in front of the office!

footer.tagline: We craft even a single book with your precious heart.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Sewon Printing. All Rights Reserved.

contact.page_description: Contact Sewon Printing for inquiries about printing, copying, and binding services. We'll respond quickly to your quotes and questions.
contact.page_keywords: Sewon Printing, contact, quote request, inquiry, printing contact
contact.header_subtitle: Feel free to contact us anytime for inquiries or quote requests. We'll provide fast and accurate responses.

form.success: Your inquiry has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible.

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email format.

services_page.page_description: Discover Sewon Printing's various services. Get all your printing, copying, binding, and scanning needs handled in one place.
services_page.page_keywords: Sewon Printing, printing services, copying services, binding services, scanning services
services_page.header_subtitle: We craft even a single book with your precious heart. Sewon Printing offers various printing, copying, and binding services. We meet all your requirements with the latest equipment and skilled technology.

features.multiple_file_formats: Multiple File Formats (PDF, JPEG, TIFF, etc.)

portfolio_page.page_description: Check out Sewon Printing's various portfolio items. View examples of menu boards, booklets, brochures, and binding cases.
portfolio_page.page_keywords: Sewon Printing, printing portfolio, portfolio, binding examples, printing cases
portfolio_page.header_subtitle: Check out various printed materials created by Sewon Printing. These are results completed with high-quality printing and precise binding technology.

location_page.page_description: Find directions to Sewon Printing. We are a professional printing, copying, and binding shop located in Yeongdeungpo.
location_page.page_keywords: Sewon Printing, directions, Yeongdeungpo, location, map
location_page.header_subtitle: We'll guide you to Sewon Printing's location and transportation options.

review1.name: Mr. K
review1.title: Design Company CEO
review1.content: We had our company brochures made at Sewon Printing, and the results were really satisfying. The colors were accurate and the finishing was clean, which made a good impression on our clients. Thank you for processing it quickly despite the tight schedule.

review2.name: Ms. L
review2.title: Graduate Student
review2.content: I had my thesis bound here, and they really worked meticulously. I was worried because it was an important thesis to submit to my professor, but they completed it with quality beyond my expectations. I will definitely use their services again next time.

review3.name: Mr. P
review3.title: Cafe Owner
review3.content: I had cafe menus made, and customers have been showing favorable reactions to the menu design. The coating is well done, so they maintain their neat appearance even after long use. The price is reasonable and the service is good, so I've recommended them to other business owners around me.

contact_info.kakao_note: * Fast response during business hours on weekdays.

inquiry_guide.title: Inquiry Guide
inquiry_guide.subtitle: Please contact us directly using the contact information below.
inquiry_guide.email_description: Please send quote requests to eunyangp@hanmail.net.
inquiry_guide.email_details: For quote requests, please provide detailed information about work type, quantity, paper type, size, color/black & white, binding method, etc. for more accurate quotes.
inquiry_guide.visit_description: Please visit 15 Yeongsin-ro 30-gil, Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul (near Yeongdeungpo Fire Station).
inquiry_guide.visit_parking: Brief parking available in front of the office!

q1.question: How long does bulk printing take?
q1.answer: For bulk printing, the time required varies depending on order volume and work complexity. Generally, less than 100 pages takes same day or next day, 500 pages or more takes about 2-3 days. Exact schedule will be informed upon inquiry.

q2.question: What file formats do you support?
q2.answer: We support most common file formats including PDF, Word(docx, doc), PowerPoint(pptx, ppt), Excel(xlsx, xls), JPG, PNG. For special file formats, please contact us in advance to confirm support.

q3.question: What binding methods are available?
q3.answer: We provide various binding methods including spiral binding, perfect binding, saddle stitching, hardcover binding, staple binding. Each binding method is suitable for different purposes and page counts, so we recommend the optimal binding method through consultation.

q4.question: How can I request a quote?
q4.answer: You can request quotes through phone (02-6015-3100), email (eunyangp@hanmail.net) or website inquiry form. For accurate quotes, please provide information about type of printing/copying/binding, quantity, paper type, finishing method, etc. for faster response.

q5.question: Is urgent work possible?
q5.answer: Yes, urgent work is possible. If you contact us in advance, we will help you complete the work as quickly as possible. However, for bulk work or complex binding, minimum work time is required, so please understand.

q1.question: How can I get a quote?
q1.answer: You can request quotes through phone, email, or this inquiry form. For quote requests, please provide detailed information about work type, quantity, paper type, size, color/black & white, binding method, etc. for more accurate quotes.

q2.question: How long does work completion take?
q2.answer: Work period varies depending on work type, quantity, and complexity. Simple copying/binding can be completed same day, while bulk work or special binding takes about 2-3 days. Exact work period will be provided when ordering.

q3.question: How do I send files?
q3.answer: Small files can be sent via email (eunyangp@hanmail.net), and large files can be sent through KakaoTalk Open Chat. Fast consultation and file transfer are available via KakaoTalk.

q4.question: What payment methods are available?
q4.answer: Cash, card payment, and bank transfer are all available. Tax invoice issuance is also possible, so please let us know in advance if needed. For bulk work, advance payment may be requested.

q5.question: Is delivery available?
q5.answer: Yes, courier delivery is available. Shipping costs may vary by region and weight, and direct delivery is also possible for bulk orders within Seoul area. Please contact us for details.
